name: Goldseeker (onlyrpgrollyourdice)
description:
Survive, grab coins, explore!!. You have to survive in this dangerous dungeon. Many players will hunt you to steal all your coins. They want them all, they want to buy all content in the game and make you sad and poor. Don’t let them do that, fight!, explore! and above all, ENJOY!!!

If you can join with a friend you will enjoy the game even more. Kill each other and steal all the coins!!!

PD: Don’t forget, you are going to join in a multiplayer game where 1 hit can kill you.
